<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Murderer's Knot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=228)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 568 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 66 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>command</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You damage a flat-footed creature with a Strike using the Affixed weapon

**Requirement** You are an expert with the affixed weapon
</row>

</column>

---

This black strand of leather is tied to look like a peace knot when the weapon is worn, but it doesn't hamper drawing the weapon. When you activate the knot, the creature you damaged takes 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

 If you have the [Twist the Knife](/Feats.aspx?ID=570) feat, the talisman instead deals persistent bleed damage equal to your sneak attack damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Murderer's Knot
requirement: You are an expert with the affixed weapon
requirement_markdown: You are an expert with the affixed weapon
